section.title: Part 1: HPE End User License Agreement
section.p: The end user license agreement is provided at the time of purchase.

section.title: Part 2: Additional License Authorizations (ALA)
section.p: Additional license authorizations for are available at: http://docs.hpcloud.com/pdf/static/HPE_HOS_5.0_ALA_May2017.pdf.

section.title: Part 3: Open Source and Third Party License Terms
section.p: License information related to ancillary, third party, and open source software components are available at: http://docs.hpcloud.com/pdf/static/HPE_HOS_5.0_OpenSource_and_3rd_Party_Licenses.pdf.
